appearancePrompt: An old dude with a big dick
name: John Mc Cockblock

occupation.description: Served in an organized fighting force before the collapse. Knows formations, weapon maintenance, and how to follow orders under fire. Discipline is second nature.
occupation.name: Soldier

traits.description: You can actually read the old manuals. +15% XP Gain.
traits.name: Pre-Ash Scholar

traits.description: A weak frame plagued by old injuries. -15 Max HP.
traits.name: Frail

traits.description: Quick reflexes honed by dodging falling debris. +10% Evasion in combat.
traits.name: Nimble

traits.description: Charisma that works even in the Ash. Better rates with all traders.
traits.name: Silver Tongue
